rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0001
rows.name:
Suzaku, I think we can see the
whole village from here...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0002
rows.name: Yeah, the view is excellent.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0003
rows.name: This is a nice village...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0004
rows.name:
They may not be rich, but
everyone looks happy.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0005
rows.name:
They seem to keep moving
forward without losing heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0006
rows.name:
That's because this village was
built by Vandham-san. His spirit
still supports the people here.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0007
rows.name:
I see, so this is the village
created and protected by Vandham,
the man who used to be my Driver..

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0008
rows.name: What should I say...?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0009
rows.name: Do you want to hear about Vandham-san?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0010
rows.name: Do you wish you could stay here?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0101
rows.name:
Well... I'm not sure if it's
right to talk about my previous
Driver in front of you, Rex...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0102
rows.name:
He sounds like he was a
fine man, so I am curious.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0103
rows.name: Yeah, he was...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0104
rows.name:
He had a big voice, a big body,
and an even bigger heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0105
rows.name:
He taught me the fundamentals
of being a Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0106
rows.name: Actually, it was more than just that...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0107
rows.name:
He taught me about Blades,
fighting techniques, and
how this world works...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0108
rows.name:
Our time together wasn't
long, but he taught me so
many valuable lessons.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0109
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0110
rows.name:
He was probably the kind of good man
that women wouldn't leave alone.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0111
rows.name:
Yeah, he was a good person.
Though I don't know if he
was popular with women.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0112
rows.name:
I've lost my memories of such a
guy... That's frustrating...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0113
rows.name: Don't worry about it.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0114
rows.name: As I mentioned earlier...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0115
rows.name:
His spirit lives on in
everyone here, and in us too.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0116
rows.name:
I may still be a novice,
but I'm determined to
become as good as he was.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0117
rows.name:
So, Suzaku, you need to
keep watching me closely.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0118
rows.name: Alright, I hear you...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0119
rows.name:
As your Blade, I'll be watching
your progress closely...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0201
rows.name: That's not really it.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0202
rows.name:
First of all, I don't have memories
of living in this village.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0203
rows.name:
But perhaps something that
Vandham and I created still
remains in this village...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0204
rows.name:
When I think about that, I
somehow get sentimental.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0205
rows.name: Yeah, I understand...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0206
rows.name:
Perhaps this village holds
the spirit of both Vandham-san
and you, Suzaku.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0207
rows.name:
I wonder how that man and I
spent our time together?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0208
rows.name: I bet it was pretty ordinary.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0209
rows.name: Ordinary?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0210
rows.name: That's right. Ordinary.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0211
rows.name:
Waking up in the morning, working while
taking care of the children, eating lots
of delicious food with a smile...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0212
rows.name:
Having a beer while chatting about
future plans, then going to bed
and probably snoring away.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0213
rows.name:
In order to create a village
where people can live such
ordinary lives...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0214
rows.name:
I believe both Vandham-san
and you, Suzaku, fought
earnestly for that goal.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0215
rows.name: To lead an ordinary life...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0216
rows.name:
So the villagers here are still valuing
and living that normal life...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0217
rows.name:
Tell me, Rex, was Vandham
a gentle person?

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0218
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0219
rows.name:
He was honest with everyone,
straightforward without any deception...

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0220
rows.name:
Above all, he was a big
guy with a warm heart.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0221
rows.name:
He might scold me for saying
this, but he was something
like a father to me.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0222
rows.name: That's why I wanted to be like him.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0223
rows.name:
He must have been quite a man to
earn such praise from you, Rex. It's
unfortunate I can't meet him now.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0224
rows.name:
He was a caring person. He's probably
watching over us from somewhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0225
rows.name:
Is that so... Then I can't let him
see me doing anything shameful.

rows.label: kizunatalk018_msg0226
rows.name:
Yeah, we'd better show him
we've become proper adults or
he might give us an earful.
